I have looked at and researched what other rooms go for and can tell you that this is a great deal since you get lots of privacy and space here.
READ THIS CAREFULLY. I am looking for a room/house mate and I will choose carefully. THIS IS A GREAT OPPORTUNITY for someone because it is total privacy, have lots of space ( you actually have a whole level of a house to yourself ) I am usually at work and any attention or company for my dog would be great. If you have a SMALL Dog - GREAT ! I like all dogs but would hope you have a small one. IF YOU ARE LOOKING FOR JUST A FEW MONTHS - THAT IS FINE ! I am ok with someone who does not know if they are going to stay or know that it is for short term
I am looking for someone down to earth - as I am and someone who I can be comfortable with. I hope you read that last statement, because I will only choose someone who I feel good about. It is that simple!!!!!. Most people usually understand and appreciate that. We will have to share utilities.
THIS IS FOR ONE PERSON. I am not flexible on this one- so if you have a girl friend or boy friend who would be over all the time, this is not it. There are many other things I would consider, but not on this one. No, I would not be into your business at all. I don`t care what you are into ! The reason for that last one with a spouse is that it then becomes a 3 party house - no matter what and there is no 3 rd room mate. This is s a little house in a quiet neighborhood. I hope to find someone who wants privacy. EVERONE WHO HAS COME TO LOOK IN THE PAST, HAS LIKED IT AND USUALLY wants to take the opportunity but please understand that I will choose carefully.
This a GREAT LOCATION. It is 3 minutes from the Greenbelt Metro. I can hear the train operator`s words when the train leaves the station !!! The street going to the Metro is well lit and you are a stone throw from UMD. I want to be comfortable in my own house. Just be a nice person ! (eventhough we may not have much contact, I wan t to make sure that we.... well, feel comfy around each other )
Oh, the money is flexible - it depends on what we agree on - and some other factors. If you need more than one room and have lots of stuff .... I have either another room to help you with that or in the basement. The current person is leaving after staying here for a short term period. ( I choose her because she only needed to stay for a short term ) Yes, I choosy but I tell you that i am down to earth and just know what I am comfortable with and being upfront is best. House, 10 Bedrooms + Den, 5.5 Baths, (Sleeps 20)
Enjoy Cape Cod the way it was experienced in yesteryear - peaceful, relaxing, and full of natural beauty. This spacious and comfortable home has been in our family since 1927. It is a truly unique property with lots of character. Situated on Vineyard Sound with unbelievable views of Martha`s Vineyard, Nobska Lighthouse, and Falmouth Heights, our home has a private sandy beach and the summer swimming is without equal.
The house is bordered on one side by the ocean and on the other by a private dirt road that runs parallel to the readily accessible Shining Sea Bikeway. It`s about 2.5 miles to downtown Falmouth, and a one mile leisurely stroll down the bike path and along Little Harbor to downtown Woods Hole: still franchise-free with quaint buildings, coffee shops, the ferry to Martha`s Vineyard, an aquarium and information centers for a scientific community hosting the Marine Biological Laboratories and the Oceanographic Institution

postings.body:
3340 West Ave-(1st floor), is located in a wonderfully convenient spot on the Island, situated in walking distance to many attractions, recreation and shopping...right off the convenient 34th street bridge.
Just 2 1/2 short blocks to the Beach! Get those flip-flops ready...
Wawa, CVS, Blitz`s, Acme, Dottie`s Pastries and Hoy`s 5 & 10, just to name a few, are within a block or two of the corner. Stroll over to Sandcastle Park with the kids, or play tennis and basketball with friends. Grab an ice-cream cone on the walk back at Johnny B Goode Ice Cream Parlor and practice your hula-hoop routine. There are lots to do in the area without ever getting back into your car.
Rent a bike on the corner... of 34th and West Avenue. Enjoy a family bike ride to the boardwalk beginning at 23rd street, extending 2.5 miles. If you prefer to drive, don`t forget to stop by all the posh shops on Asbury Avenue on your way to the boards. Boardwalk shops, restaurants and rides between 6th and 14th streets.
Our home is a 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom, 1st floor condo...
Our lovely master bedroom with its newer furniture accommodates a queen bed and a large attached Master Bath. The other 2 bedrooms are both fitted with twin beds. The hall bathroom contains a sizeable closet. An additional outdoor shower is located on the south side of the building. We also offer 2 off-street parking in rear: enclosed garage and pad.
Put your feet up and relax... on the front covered porch. The kitchen is fully equipped with dishes, refrigerator, dishwasher and microwave. Standard washer and dryer are located in hall closet. Central air conditioning, 3 TVs, 2 DVD/VCR players, a selection of movies, books and board games are provided for your entertainment and fun. A few beach chairs, umbrellas, a wagon with sand toys located in the garage are available for your use. Be sure to pack your linens, blankets, bath/ beach towels, as these are not supplied. Step outside the backdoor for a quick trip to the ACME to fill your fridge. A pull cart is located in the garage for convenience. Also included are 4 beach tags and wireless internet.
This is a NO Smoking and NO Pets unit.
Check-in at 2:00pm. Check-out at 10:00am
Security Deposit of $300.00 is required.
Thank you for your interest.
AUG 30 = $1250
SEPT 6 = $1100

With the great 2 bedroom condo it overlooks the lake at Arrowhead.

postings.heading: 2 BR 2 BA Condo Myrtle Beach, SC

postings.body:
3 bedroom, 2 bathroom apartment PH takes up the entire 6th floor of the building, and consists of a second floor bedroom and a private rooftop terrace. The living room contains a large chocolate brown L-shaped leather sofa, matching coffee table, and large flat screen TV. The dining area seats four with additional seating at a breakfast bar in the kitchen. For your convenience the kitchen has a dishwasher, wine cooler, and ample cabinet space. Adjacent to the kitchen is a washer and a dryer for your expediency. The first bathroom, located on the 1st floor of the apartment, features a double sink, all white tiles and dark wood storage drawers, and a heated towel rack with towels. The large shower has a rainfall shower head and body jets for an ultimate shower experience. The 2nd bathroom, attached the 2nd floor bedroom has a similar look and features a single sink, heated towel rack, and shower with a rainfall showerhead and body jets.
The upstairs bedroom has a king size bed with all linens, a large armoire, and a dresser with a rising large flat screen TV. The first of the two first floor bedrooms has a queen size bed with all linens, a large closet for all of your belongings, and a flat screen TV mounted on the wall. This room also features two storage cubes for additional storage space. The 2nd bedroom also has a queen size bed, mounted flat screen TV, closet space and two storage cubes. Additionally, a desk and chair for your at home work convenience.
CALL TO VIEW

postings.body:
Near downtown post office , this office is located on cass and has one flight of stairs. This is sunny and lovingly furnished and has a healing feng shui vibration set
You would share a waiting area and bathroom with 2 others. And you could park and have clients park in the parking lot that we share with the other health offices.
We are behind the healthy way diet center and next door to the breast care center Our exact adress is- 1015 cass st. Suite 7. We are one massage therapist and one doctor of medical qigong therapy.
Your monthly rent is $350 and $200 deposit and you would have full use of your half of the office Mondas through Thursdays.
The half that is for rent has a massage table if needed and has a desk and 3 chairs and bookshelf as seen in photos. Also the waiting room has two sofas - tea service and mini fridge.
See photos and please call to see up a viewing
